Tender Notice: Special Credit Solicitor List

We are issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the establishment of a Special Credit Solicitor List. The purpose of this RFP is to select experienced law firms to represent our organization and provide legal services on our special credit collection and recovery files.

About Farm Credit Canada

As Canada's leading agriculture and food lender, we provide over $44 billion in loans to our clients, with a focus on providing flexible and competitively priced financing solutions, as well as management software, information, and knowledge to support the agriculture and food industry. Our self-sustaining corporate model allows us to provide an appropriate return to our shareholder and reinvest profits back into the industry and communities we serve.

RFP Scope

This RFP invites proposals from capable law firms to provide legal services on our special credit collection and recovery files. The selected firms will be required to provide expertise and capacity in all 10 major Canadian provinces. We aim to establish a list of preferred law firms that can be engaged to represent our organization in these matters.

RFP Schedule

* RFP issue date: September 7, 2022 * Vendor questions accepted until: September 21, 2022 at 2:00PM CST * RFP closing date and time: October 24, 2022 at 2:00 PM CST

RFP Process Considerations

Please note that this RFP is a non-binding, competitive request for proposals, and we reserve the right to cancel the RFP at any time. Our procurement process allows for negotiation with one or more vendors prior to awarding a contract.

How to Obtain the RFP Document

Vendors interested in receiving a copy of the RFP document should contact Dhruv Bhatt, Procurement and Vendor Manager at procurement@fcc-fac.ca. Please note that vendors will not receive the RFP document by registering on the buyandsell.ca list of interested suppliers. They must request the document through our designated RFP contact.
